features.name: App Routing
features.description: Main application routing with protected routes and role-based access

features.name: Authentication Pages
features.description: Login and registration pages for user authentication

features.name: Protected Route Component
features.description: Route protection component that checks authentication and role permissions

features.name: Dashboard Layout
features.description: Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation for clients and freelancers

features.name: Admin Layout
features.description: Admin panel layout with sidebar navigation

features.name: Overview Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard overview showing statistics for clients and freelancers

features.name: Post Job
features.description: Client page to post new jobs with title, category, description, budget, and deadline

features.name: My Jobs
features.description: Client page showing all posted jobs with status, budget, and actions

features.name: Job Details
features.description: Detailed view of a job with bids (for clients) or bid form (for freelancers)

features.name: Browse Jobs
features.description: Freelancer page to browse available jobs with search and category filters

features.name: Place Bid
features.description: Freelancer page to place a bid on a specific job

features.name: My Bids
features.description: Freelancer page showing all submitted bids with status

features.name: Messages
features.description: Messaging system for clients and freelancers on hired jobs

features.name: Profile
features.description: User profile page to update name, bio, and skills

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin dashboard showing platform statistics and recent activity

features.name: Manage Users
features.description: Admin page to view, block/unblock, and delete users

features.name: Manage Jobs
features.description: Admin page to view all jobs and force close them

features.name: API Service
features.description: Axios-based API client with interceptors for authentication and error handling

features.name: Authentication Utilities
features.description: Utility functions for token management, user management, and role checking
